title: Game still freezing riot.....
body: Every game has been freezing early in, starting to wonder if you guys will ever fix this. {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Issue should be resolved now (you won't need to do anything, it should just work properly).  Let me know if it is still happening

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Afic,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ovQ2NHOj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-05T00:39:24.231+0000)
>
> Issue should be resolved now (you won't need to do anything, it should just work properly).  Let me know if it is still happening

The game is still fucked m8.

Our recent fix addressed most of the occurrences but not all of them.  If you follow these steps it will help us identify the root cause of the remaining freezes

1.  When the issue occurs, open up task manager (ctrl + alt + del, and then select task manager)
2.  Right click the process that says ‘League of Legends (TM) Client’ and click ‘Create dump file’.  This will take a few moments.
3.  Copy the link and navigate to the folder.  For me it looks like this: 
	C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\League of Legends.DMP
	I would want to go to C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\ in windows explorer

4.  Go to https://www.filemail.com/ select ‘Send as link’ (next to send as email towards the middle), and click the Add Files button.  Navigate to the DMP file from above, and then click ‘Send’.  You will be prompted with another window, where you click ‘Send’ again.  (This will take a little while).
5.  You will be provided with a link, which will lead us to the file you just uploaded.  Copy/paste that link in this thread.

Hi the game is still freezing for me (EUW). I've disabled IPv6 which reduced the freeze to a few seconds but it doesn't work fully if my anti-virus is not disabled. (I've sent my logs already to the support a few days ago which was the reason I tested without ipv6 and anti-virus).

looks like our fix addressed most of the cases but not all.  If you could follow these steps it would really help us with tracking down the problem.

1.  When the issue occurs, open up task manager (ctrl + alt + del, and then select task manager)
2.  Right click the process that says ‘League of Legends (TM) Client’ and click ‘Create dump file’.  This will take a few moments.
3.  Copy the link and navigate to the folder.  For me it looks like this: 
	C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\League of Legends.DMP
	I would want to go to C:\Users\acohen\AppData\Local\Temp\ in windows explorer

4.  Go to https://www.filemail.com/ select ‘Send as link’ (next to send as email towards the middle), and click the Add Files button.  Navigate to the DMP file from above, and then click ‘Send’.  You will be prompted with another window, where you click ‘Send’ again.  (This will take a little while).
5.  You will be provided with a link, which will lead us to the file you just uploaded.  Copy/paste that link in this thread.

Hi guys, if you run into this problem it would really help us out if you can follow these instructions and provide us with some information to debug the issue:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/1yUAdeKV-in-game-freezing?show=flat&comment=003e

<3
